item.description:
Emily and Lexie will be leading a pack walk this coming Saturday at Bare Cove in Hingham, 10am.

Dogs must be on a leash in the parking lot and for the first 100 feet inside the park.

The trails are wide and flat and the circuit is about 3 1/2 miles long. This is an off leash park with beaches, woods and fields. A wonderful place for the dogs to run and play.

The road in is across the street from the Hingham Commuter Station on Fort Hill St. Go past the Fire Station Museum to the parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: Emily and Lexie (Wheaten Terrier) will be waiting inside the gate.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Bare Cove November Big Pack walk
